tooltip.barium.cull_empty_sections:
Skips rendering sections of the world that only contain air.
Huge performance boost.
tooltip.barium.enable_chunk_update_throt:
Limits how many chunks are sent to the GPU per frame.
Reduces stutters when moving or turning quickly.
tooltip.barium.max_chunk_uploads:
The max number of chunks uploaded to the GPU each frame.
Lower values = smoother, higher values = faster world loading.
tooltip.barium.enable_block_entity_culli: Stops rendering block entities (chests, signs) that are too far away.
tooltip.barium.block_entity_render_dista: Max distance at which block entities are rendered.
tooltip.barium.enable_block_entity_occlu:
Stops rendering block entities that are hidden behind other blocks.
Can significantly improve FPS in complex scenes.
tooltip.barium.block_entity_occlusion_mi:
The culling check only activates for entities beyond this distance.
Avoids checks on very close objects.
tooltip.barium.enable_dense_foliage_cull: Randomly skips rendering some grass and ferns to make dense areas less demanding.
tooltip.barium.dense_foliage_culling_lev: How aggressively to cull foliage. 0 = off, 3 = max culling.
tooltip.barium.disable_entity_outlines: Completely disables the glowing outline effect (e.g., from spectral arrows).
tooltip.barium.enable_half_res_outlines: Renders the glowing effect at half resolution for better performance.
tooltip.barium.disable_vignette: Removes the dark overlay at the screen edges, especially in dark areas.
tooltip.barium.disable_toasts: Hides the recipe/advancement pop-ups in the top-right corner.
tooltip.barium.enable_entity_tick_cullin:
Reduces the update frequency of distant entities' logic (AI).
Improves CPU performance in areas with many mobs.
tooltip.barium.entity_tick_distance: Entities beyond this distance will have their logic updates reduced.
tooltip.barium.reduce_ambient_particles:
Reduces the frequency of ambient particle effects (torch smoke, water drips).
Reduces constant CPU usage.
tooltip.barium.enable_hopper_culling: Reduces the update frequency of distant hoppers. Huge CPU saver for farms.
tooltip.barium.reduce_explosion_particle: Greatly reduces the amount of particles from explosions to prevent lag spikes.
tooltip.barium.enable_beacon_culling: Prevents rendering of very distant beacon beams.
tooltip.barium.enable_frustum_culling:
Prevents the game from rebuilding chunks that are not inside the camera's view.
Reduces CPU load when turning around.
tooltip.barium.enable_fog_optimization: Allows Barium to control fog distance for better visibility and performance.
tooltip.barium.disable_fog: Completely removes distance fog. Overrides the start percentage slider.
tooltip.barium.fog_start_percentage: At what percentage of your render distance the fog should start. Vanilla is ~75%.
